comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT November 30, 1914 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB081EF63C5C1373... reports that Edward Bright, an American living in Germany was arrested and charged with being a spy. This might be him.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Jan 27, 1915 reports his return to the US. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00816FB3E5C13738...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq:  It does seem possible this is the same person.  We'll include this information next time we update.
